about_the_game:
The game is currently available as an Early Access version.

The game is still incomplete, and various elements are planned to be expanded in the future.

There may also be bugs remaining in the game. If you come across any, we would greatly appreciate it if you could report them on the forum:

The purchase price of the game will be gradually adjusted as new content is added and the game develops.

Once you've purchased the game, you can continue playing without any additional payments, even if the price increases in the future.

Regarding save data, we will strive to ensure it is retained. However, during the course of future updates, there may be unavoidable cases where save data cannot be carried over. We kindly ask for your understanding in advance.

About This Game

This is a casual roguelike game where you become nanomachines to protect the human body from viruses and bacteria.

As time progresses, the human body ages and becomes increasingly vulnerable to viruses, bacteria, cancer cells, and more.

Nanomachines come with a power-up feature.

Acquire various weapons and eliminate external threats!

Viruses and bacteria become stronger over time, so strategically upgrade your weapons to stay ahead.

In the Early Access version, the number of playable units, weapon types, and stages is limited.

Look forward to future updates, as we plan to add many new elements!

Game Tips:

・Focus on collecting experience points first. Start by defeating enemies you can handle.

・Survival is key in the early game. Master the art of dodging and running away effectively.

・Look for items on the map. Don’t miss chances to heal or power up!

・Find weapons that suit your playstyle. Your strategy will change depending on the combinations you choose.

Streaming Guidelines

Anyone is free to stream this game, and no prior permission is required.

If you stream the game, we’ll do our best to share it as much as possible. To make it easier for us to find, please use the hashtag #VirusHunter when posting about it.

Alternatively, you can notify us directly on X (Twitter) at @kenjikatou.

Note: The use of this game for illegal activities, unethical purposes, or anything that violates public order and morals is strictly prohibited.
detailed_description:
Roadmap

We are planning the following updates:

  • Implementation of a character status enhancement feature

  • Implementation of a cloud save feature

  • UI adjustments

  • Addition of new enemy types

  • Addition of new weapon types

  • Support for Chinese (Simplified and Traditional)

In January 2025, we will prioritize the following updates:

  • Addition of new weapon types

  • Implementation of a character status enhancement feature

  • Support for Chinese (Simplified and Traditional)

We will also sequentially add new stages, expand the story, and introduce additional new features beyond those listed above. Please look forward to it!
